Repository Name Unauthorized: University of New Orleans Louisiana and Special Collections Department
Street Address 1: Earl K. Long Library, University of New Orleans
Notes: More than 350 collections of manuscripts and archives, including the official archives of the university, the Louisiana State Supreme Court, the Orleans Parish School Board, and The Chamber/New Orleans and the River Region, to name but a few. Strengths include post-19th-century ethnic and business records of New Orleans.
